name: Snake Evolved Danger Edition
description:
The Game

You are a playful snake trying to feed in a garden located in the heart of a nice and peaceful neighborhood.

Can you satisfy your stomach and find the food you need?

The What and the Credits

This game has been made for the Go Godot Game Jam 2022.

A game by Sepafo:

Pierre-Igor Berthet, development & modeling
Boris Poget, modeling

Controls ActionKeyboardGamepad Steer left/rightArrowsD-PadGrowSpaceX or YReleaseCtrl/ERight trigger
